languages.text: "Должна отметить, что пока в топливном отсеке не происходило каких-либо инцидентов, а верования данной секты не отражаются ни на покорности рабочих, ни на их эффективности — все сборы проводятся строго в неурочное время по разрешению начальства. Однако если вы сочтете их практики недопустимыми, мы немедленно прекратим это".

"I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."
languages.original_text: "Должна отметить, что пока в топливном отсеке не происходило каких-либо инцидентов, а верования данной секты не отражаются ни на покорности рабочих, ни на их эффективности — все сборы проводятся строго в неурочное время по разрешению начальства. Однако если вы сочтете их практики недопустимыми, мы немедленно прекратим это".

traits.locale_text: "I must point out that so far there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

"I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

"I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

languages.text: «Debería señalar que no se ha producido ningún incidente hasta ahora en el compartimento de combustible, y que las creencias de la secta no afectan a la obediencia ni la eficiencia de sus trabajadores en ningún aspecto. Todos los encuentros se realizan después del horario de trabajo con el permiso de sus superiores. No obstante, si considera sus prácticas inaceptables, les pondremos fin de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

traits.locale_text: «Debería señalar que no se ha producido ningún incidente hasta ahora en el compartimento de combustible, y que las creencias de la secta no afectan a la obediencia ni la eficiencia de sus trabajadores en ningún aspecto. Todos los encuentros se realizan después del horario de trabajo con el permiso de sus superiores. No obstante, si considera sus prácticas inaceptables, les pondremos fin de inmediato».

languages.text: 「これまで燃料区画で事故は起きていないこと、また、この宗派の信条で労働者の従順さや能率に一切影響は出ていないことをお伝えしておきます。すべての集会は上官の許可を得た上で、就業時間外に限って行われています。ただし、その修行内容が容認できないと判断なされた場合は、直ちに中止させましょう」
languages.original_text: "I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

traits.locale_text: 「これまで燃料区画で事故は起きていないこと、また、この宗派の信条で労働者の従順さや能率に一切影響は出ていないことをお伝えしておきます。すべての集会は上官の許可を得た上で、就業時間外に限って行われています。ただし、その修行内容が容認できないと判断なされた場合は、直ちに中止させましょう」

languages.text: “请允许我指出这一点——到目前为止，燃油舱室还没有发生过任何事故，教派的信仰也不会对工人的服从性或工作效率产生任何影响。教派的所有集会，都需要得到管理人员的许可，而且只允许在下班之后进行。不过，如果您无法接受这些人的行为，我们将即刻予以取缔。”
languages.original_text: "I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我指出这一点——到目前为止，燃油舱室还没有发生过任何事故，教派的信仰也不会对工人的服从性或工作效率产生任何影响。教派的所有集会，都需要得到管理人员的许可，而且只允许在下班之后进行。不过，如果您无法接受这些人的行为，我们将即刻予以取缔。”

languages.text: "Ich sollte erwähnen, dass es im Treibstofflager bislang keine Vorkommnisse gab, und dass der Glauben dieser Sekte keinen Einfluss auf den Gehorsam oder die Effizienz der Arbeiter hat. Alle Treffen werden außerhalb der Arbeitszeit mit Genehmigung der Vorgesetzten abgehalten. Solltet Ihr ihre Praktiken allerdings für inakzeptabel erachten, werden wir ihnen sofort einen Riegel vorschieben."
languages.original_text: "I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

traits.locale_text: Ich sollte erwähnen, dass es im Treibstofflager bislang keine Vorkommnisse gab, und dass der Glauben dieser Sekte keinen Einfluss auf den Gehorsam oder die Effizienz der Arbeiter hat. Alle Treffen werden außerhalb der Arbeitszeit mit Genehmigung der Vorgesetzten abgehalten. Solltet Ihr ihre Praktiken allerdings für inakzeptabel erachten, werden wir ihnen sofort einen Riegel vorschieben."

languages.text: « Je me dois de préciser qu'aucun incident n'a été signalé dans le réservoir de carburant jusqu'à présent, et que les croyances de cette secte n'affectent en rien l'obéissance ou l'efficacité des travailleurs. Leurs assemblées ont toujours lieu en dehors des heures de travail, et uniquement avec l'autorisation de leurs supérieurs. Cela dit, si vous jugez ces pratiques inacceptables, nous pouvons y mettre un terme. »
languages.original_text: "I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."

traits.locale_text: « Je me dois de préciser qu'aucun incident n'a été signalé dans le réservoir de carburant jusqu'à présent, et que les croyances de cette secte n'affectent en rien l'obéissance ou l'efficacité des travailleurs. Leurs assemblées ont toujours lieu en dehors des heures de travail, et uniquement avec l'autorisation de leurs supérieurs. Cela dit, si vous jugez ces pratiques inacceptables, nous pouvons y mettre un terme. »

languages.text: "Şu ana kadar yakıt kompartımanında herhangi bir hadise yaşanmadığına ve bu cemaatin inançlarının işçilerin itaatkârlıklarını da verimliliklerini de hiçbir şekilde etkilemediğine dikkat çekmek isterim. Tüm toplantılar, amirlerinin de izniyle tamamen iş saatlerinden sonra gerçekleştiriliyor. Ancak ibadetlerini kabul edilemez görüyorsanız buna derhâl son verebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "I should point out that there have been no incidents in the fuel compartment so far, and that the beliefs of this sect do not affect the obedience of the workers or their efficiency in any way. All assemblies are conducted strictly after hours with the permission of their superiors. However, if you find their practices unacceptable, we will put a stop to them immediately."
